trans-unit.source: MultiDict implements all standard dictionary methods. Internally, it saves all values for a key as a list, but the standard dict access methods will only return the first value for a key. If you want to gain access to the other values, too, you have to use the list methods as explained below.
trans-unit.target: MultiDict 实现所有标准词典方法。在内部，它将键的所有值保存为列表，但是标准dict访问方法将仅返回键的第一个值。如果您也想访问其他值，则必须使用如下所述的 list 方法。

trans-unit.source: werkzeug.urls used to provide several wrapper functions for Python 2 urlparse, whose main purpose were to work around the behavior of the Py2 stdlib and its lack of unicode support. While this was already a somewhat inconvenient situation, it got even more complicated because Python 3’s urllib.parse actually does handle unicode properly. In other words, this module would wrap two libraries with completely different behavior. So now this module contains a 2-and-3-compatible backport of Python 3’s urllib.parse, which is mostly API-compatible.
trans-unit.target: werkzeug.urls 过去为Python 2 urlparse提供了几个包装函数，其主要目的是解决Py2 stdlib的行为以及缺乏unicode支持的问题。尽管这已经有些不方便，但由于Python 3的 urllib.parse 实际上确实能够正确处理unicode ，因此情况变得更加复杂。换句话说，该模块将包装两个行为完全不同的库。因此，此模块现在包含Python 3的 urllib.parse 的2和3兼容的反向端口，该端口大多与API兼容。

trans-unit.source: General rule: Leave the WSGI input stream alone. Especially in WSGI middlewares. Use either the parsing functions or the request object. Do not mix multiple WSGI utility libraries for form data parsing or anything else that works on the input stream.
trans-unit.target: 一般规则：不要理会WSGI输入流。特别是在WSGI中间件中。使用解析函数或请求对象。不要混合使用多个WSGI实用程序库来进行表单数据解析或对输入流起作用的任何其他内容。

trans-unit.source: A MultiDict is a dictionary subclass customized to deal with multiple values for the same key which is for example used by the parsing functions in the wrappers. This is necessary because some HTML form elements pass multiple values for the same key.
trans-unit.target: 甲 MultiDict 是定制，以处理对于其例如通过在包装解析函数中使用相同的密钥的多个值的字典子类。这是必需的，因为某些HTML表单元素会为同一键传递多个值。

trans-unit.target: 一个结合了 args 和 form 的 werkzeug.datastructures.CombinedMultiDict 。

trans-unit.target: 甲 RequestCacheControl 对象用于输入缓存控制报头。

trans-unit.source: A ssl.SSLContext defining how to verify requests if the target is HTTPS. The default is None.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ssl.SSLContext 定义如何验证请求，如果目标是HTTPS。默认值为 None 。

trans-unit.source: A dict with the contents of all cookies transmitted with the request.
trans-unit.target: 一个 dict 与请求发送的所有Cookie的内容。

trans-unit.target: 上载文件的 FileMultiDict 。使用 add_file() 添加新文件。

trans-unit.target: 甲 Headers 对象与所述请求头。

trans-unit.source: A Rule represents one URL pattern. There are some options for Rule that change the way it behaves and are passed to the Rule constructor. Note that besides the rule-string all arguments must be keyword arguments in order to not break the application on Werkzeug upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 规则代表一个URL模式。 Rule 的一些选项可以更改其行为方式并传递给 Rule 构造函数。请注意，除了规则字符串以外，所有参数都必须是关键字参数，以便在Werkzeug升级时不会破坏应用程序。

trans-unit.source: A WSGI application is something you can call and pass an environ dict and a start_response callable. The environ contains all incoming information, the start_response function can be used to indicate the start of the response. With Werkzeug you don’t have to deal directly with either as request and response objects are provided to work with them.
trans-unit.target: 可以调用WSGI应用程序，并传递环境字典和可调用的 start_response 。该环境包含所有传入信息， start_response 函数可用于指示响应的开始。使用Werkzeug，您无需直接处理任何请求和响应对象，即可使用它们。

trans-unit.source: A WSGI middleware is a WSGI application that wraps another application in order to observe or change its behavior. Werkzeug provides some middleware for common use cases.
trans-unit.target: WSGI中间件是一个WSGI应用程序,它包装另一个应用程序以观察或改变其行为。Werkzeug为常见的用例提供了一些中间件。

trans-unit.source: A WSGI middleware that provides static content for development environments or simple server setups. Usage is quite simple:
trans-unit.target: 一个WSGI中间件,为开发环境或简单的服务器设置提供静态内容。使用起来相当简单。

trans-unit.target: 一个用于请求的缓存控制。这是不可改变的,并且可以访问所有与请求相关的缓存控制头。

trans-unit.source: A cache control for responses. Unlike RequestCacheControl this is mutable and gives access to response-relevant cache control headers.
trans-unit.target: 响应的缓存控件。与 RequestCacheControl 不同，它是可变的，并提供对与响应相关的缓存控制标头的访问。

trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序使用响应对象,则不需要关闭迭代器,如果响应已经开始,则完成处理。

trans-unit.source: A common example is writing a Single Page Application, where you have a backend API and a frontend written in JavaScript that does the routing in the browser rather than requesting different pages from the server. The frontend is a single HTML and JS file that should be served for any path besides “/api”.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见的示例是编写“单页应用程序”，其中有一个后端API和一个用JavaScript编写的前端，它们在浏览器中进行路由，而不是从服务器请求不同的页面。前端是一个HTML和JS文件，除了“ / api”外，还应用于其他任何路径。

trans-unit.source: A decorator that converts a function into a lazy property. The function wrapped is called the first time to retrieve the result and then that calculated result is used the next time you access the value:
trans-unit.target: 一个将函数转换为懒惰属性的装饰器。第一次调用被封装的函数来检索结果,然后在下次访问该值时使用该计算结果。

trans-unit.target: BaseRequest 子类的mixin，它为跨源资源共享（CORS）标头添加了描述符。

trans-unit.source: A mixin for BaseRequest subclasses. Request objects that mix this class in will automatically get descriptors for a couple of HTTP headers with automatic type conversion.
trans-unit.target: BaseRequest 子类的mixin 。混合了此类的请求对象将通过自动类型转换自动获取几个HTTP标头的描述符。

trans-unit.source: A mixin for BaseResponse subclasses that adds descriptors for Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) headers.
trans-unit.target: BaseResponse 子类的mixin，它为跨源资源共享（CORS）标头添加了描述符。

trans-unit.target: BaseResponse 子类的mixin 。混合了此类的响应对象将通过自动类型转换自动获取几个HTTP标头的描述符。

trans-unit.target: 具有 environ 属性的类的mixin，以获取所有HTTP Accept 标头作为Accept对象（或其子类）。

trans-unit.source: A module or other object that has dumps and loads functions that match the API of the built-in json module.
trans-unit.target: 具有 dumps 和 loads 与内置 json 模块的API匹配的功能的模块或其他对象。

trans-unit.source: A more useful header is the accept header. With this header the browser informs the web application what mimetypes it can handle and how well. All accept headers are sorted by the quality, the best item being the first:
trans-unit.target: 一个更有用的头是accept头。有了这个头,浏览器就会告诉web应用程序它可以处理哪些mimetypes以及处理得如何。所有的接受头都是按质量排序的,最好的项目是第一个。

trans-unit.source: A read only MultiDict that you can pass multiple MultiDict instances as sequence and it will combine the return values of all wrapped dicts:
trans-unit.target: 可以将多个 MultiDict 实例作为序列传递的只读 MultiDict ，它将组合所有包装的dict的返回值：

trans-unit.source: A response object is not necessarily the BaseResponse object or a subclass thereof.
trans-unit.target: 响应对象是不一定是 BaseResponse 对象或其子类。

trans-unit.source: A response wrapper is a callable that takes three arguments: the application iterator, the status and finally a list of headers. The default response wrapper returns a tuple. Because response objects have the same signature, you can use them as response wrapper, ideally by subclassing them and hooking in test functionality.
trans-unit.target: 响应包装器是一个可调用的对象,它需要三个参数:应用程序迭代器、状态和最后的头文件列表。默认的响应包装器返回一个元组。因为响应对象具有相同的签名,所以你可以使用它们作为响应包装器,最好是通过子类化它们并挂接测试功能。

trans-unit.source: A safe path, otherwise None.
trans-unit.target: 安全的路径，否则为 None 。

trans-unit.source: A sequence of http methods this rule applies to. If not specified, all methods are allowed. For example this can be useful if you want different endpoints for POST and GET. If methods are defined and the path matches but the method matched against is not in this list or in the list of another rule for that path the error raised is of the type MethodNotAllowed rather than NotFound. If GET is present in the list of methods and HEAD is not, HEAD is added automatically.
trans-unit.target: 此规则适用的一系列http方法。如果未指定，则允许所有方法。例如，如果您想为 POST 和 GET 使用不同的端点，这可能会很有用。如果定义了方法且路径匹配，但匹配的方法不在此列表中或该路径的另一个规则的列表中，则引发的错误的类型为 MethodNotAllowed 而不是 NotFound 。如果 GET 存在于方法列表中，而 HEAD 不存在，则 HEAD 将自动添加。

trans-unit.source: A server-specified data string which should be uniquely generated each time a 401 response is made. It is recommended that this string be base64 or hexadecimal data.
trans-unit.target: 一个服务器指定的数据字符串,每次作出401响应时都应唯一生成。建议该字符串为base64或十六进制数据。

trans-unit.source: A set of argument names that the function expected but where missing.
trans-unit.target: 一组函数所期望的参数名,但缺少了。

trans-unit.source: A set of quality-of-privacy directives such as auth and auth-int.
trans-unit.target: 一组隐私质量指令,如auth和auth-int。

trans-unit.source: A set that can be used to check if one etag is present in a collection of etags.
trans-unit.target: 可以用来检查一个etag是否存在于etag集合中的集合。

trans-unit.source: A special MultiDict that has convenience methods to add files to it. This is used for EnvironBuilder and generally useful for unittesting.
trans-unit.target: 一种特殊的 MultiDict ，具有方便的方法向其中添加文件。这用于 EnvironBuilder ，通常用于单元测试。

trans-unit.source: A static helper function for subclasses to add extra authentication system properties onto a class:
trans-unit.target: 子类的静态辅助函数,用于在类中添加额外的认证系统属性。

trans-unit.source: A string indicating a pair of algorithms used to produce the digest and a checksum. If this is not present it is assumed to be “MD5”. If the algorithm is not understood, the challenge should be ignored (and a different one used, if there is more than one).
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指示用于生成摘要和校验和的一对算法。如果不存在，则假定为“ MD5”。如果不了解该算法，则应忽略该挑战（如果存在多个挑战，则使用另一个挑战）。

trans-unit.source: A string of 32 hex digits computed as defined in RFC 2617, which proves that the user knows a password. Digest auth only.
trans-unit.target: RFC 2617中定义的32位十六进制数字计算的字符串,证明用户知道密码。仅限数字认证。

trans-unit.source: A string of data, specified by the server, which should be returned by the client unchanged in the Authorization header of subsequent requests with URIs in the same protection space. It is recommended that this string be base64 or hexadecimal data.
trans-unit.target: 由服务器指定的数据字符串,客户机应在随后使用同一保护空间中的URI的请求的授权头中原封不动地返回。建议该字符串为base64或十六进制数据。

trans-unit.source: A string to be displayed to users so they know which username and password to use. This string should contain at least the name of the host performing the authentication and might additionally indicate the collection of users who might have access.
trans-unit.target: 显示给用户的字符串,以便他们知道要使用哪个用户名和密码。该字符串至少应包含执行认证的主机名称,并可另外显示可能有访问权的用户集合。

trans-unit.source: A tuple in the form (stream, form, files).
trans-unit.target: 表单 (stream, form, files) 中的元组。

trans-unit.source: A very popular deployment setup on servers like lighttpd and nginx is FastCGI. To use your WSGI application with any of them you will need a FastCGI server first.
trans-unit.target: FastCGI是在lighttpd和nginx等服务器上非常流行的部署设置。要将WSGI应用程序与其中任何一个一起使用，您首先需要一个FastCGI服务器。

trans-unit.source: A very stable Python server is CherryPy. This part of the documentation shows you how to combine your WSGI application with the CherryPy WSGI server and how to configure the webserver for proxying.
trans-unit.target: 一个非常稳定的Python服务器是CherryPy。这部分文档展示了如何将WSGI应用程序与CherryPy WSGI服务器结合起来,以及如何配置webserver进行代理。

trans-unit.source: A warning is raised if the size of the cookie header exceeds max_cookie_size, but the header will still be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果Cookie标头的大小超过 max_cookie_size ，则会发出警告，但标头仍将设置。

trans-unit.source: API Levels
trans-unit.target: API级别

trans-unit.source: Accept
trans-unit.target: Accept

trans-unit.source: Accepts a floating point number expressed in seconds since the epoch in, a datetime object or a timetuple. All times in UTC. The parse_date() function can be used to parse such a date.
trans-unit.target: 接受以时间点为单位的浮点数，该时间点是自纪元以来的秒数，日期时间对象或时间元组。所有时间均为UTC。所述 parse_date() 函数可以被用于解析这样的日期。

trans-unit.source: Accessing attributes on the href object creates a new href object with the attribute name as prefix:
trans-unit.target: 在href对象上访问属性会创建一个新的href对象,并以属性名作为前缀。

trans-unit.source: Activate the environment
trans-unit.target: 激活环境

trans-unit.source: Acts as a proxy for a werkzeug local. Forwards all operations to a proxied object. The only operations not supported for forwarding are right handed operands and any kind of assignment.
trans-unit.target: 作为werkzeug local的代理。将所有操作转发到代理对象。唯一不支持转发的操作是右手操作数和任何形式的赋值。

trans-unit.source: Add a new header to the set.
trans-unit.target: 在该组中增加一个新的头。

trans-unit.source: Add a new header tuple to the list.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中添加一个新的头元组。

trans-unit.source: After parsing, we don’t know if the scheme requires the //, which is dropped if empty, but conveys different meanings in the final URL if it’s present or not. In this case, you can use safe_conversion, which will return the URL unchanged if it only contains ASCII characters and no whitespace. This can result in a URI with unquoted characters if it was not already quoted correctly, but preserves the URL’s semantics. Werkzeug uses this for the Location header for redirects.
trans-unit.target: 解析之后，我们不知道该方案是否需要 // ，如果为空，则将其丢弃，但是如果最终URL存在或不存在，则会在最终URL中传达不同的含义。在这种情况下，您可以使用 safe_conversion ，如果URL仅包含ASCII字符且没有空格，则返回的URL将保持不变。如果尚未正确引用URI，则会导致URI带有未引用的字符，但会保留URL的语义。Werkzeug使用它作为 Location 标头进行重定向。

trans-unit.source: Base response class. The most important fact about a response object is that it’s a regular WSGI application. trans-unit.source: Called before matching and building to keep the compiled rules in the correct order after things changed.
trans-unit.target: 在匹配和构建之前调用,以在事情改变后保持编译规则的正确顺序。

trans-unit.source: Called if get_json() parsing fails and isn’t silenced. If this method returns a value, it is used as the return value for get_json(). The default implementation raises BadRequest.
trans-unit.target: 如果 get_json() 解析失败并且未静音，则调用此方法。如果此方法返回一个值，它将用作 get_json() 的返回值。默认实现引发 BadRequest 。

trans-unit.source: Called to get a stream for the file upload.
trans-unit.target: 调用来获取文件上传的流。

trans-unit.source: Calling the builder escapes the string passed:
trans-unit.target: 调用构建器逃逸传递的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Calls get_json() with default arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认参数调用 get_json() 。

trans-unit.source: Can be useful if you want to have user profiles on different subdomains and all subdomains are forwarded to your application:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想在不同的子域上拥有用户配置文件,并且所有的子域都被转发到你的应用程序上,那么这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.10.
trans-unit.target: 在0.10版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.11.
trans-unit.target: 在0.11版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15.0: www_authenticate was added as the first argument, ahead of description.
trans-unit.target: 改变在0.15.0版本： www_authenticate 加入作为第一个参数，提前 description 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15.1: description was moved back as the first argument, restoring its previous position.
trans-unit.target: 在0.15.1版中进行了更改：将 description 作为第一个参数移回，以恢复其先前位置。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15.3: If the www_authenticate argument is not set, the WWW-Authenticate header is not set.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15.3中进行了更改：如果未设置 www_authenticate 参数，则不会设置 WWW-Authenticate 标头。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15.3: The response argument was restored.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15.3中更改：恢复了 response 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: RFC 2231 parameter continuations are handled.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15中进行了更改：处理了RFC 2231参数继续。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: X-Forwarded-Host and X-Forwarded-Port modify SERVER_NAME and SERVER_PORT.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15中更改： X-Forwarded-Host 和 X-Forwarded-Port 修改 SERVER_NAME 和 SERVER_PORT 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: path_info defaults to '/' if None.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15中更改： path_info 如果为 None ,则默认为 '/' 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: All headers support multiple values. The num_proxies argument is deprecated. Each header is configured with a separate number of trusted proxies.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15中更改：所有标头都支持多个值。该 num_proxies 说法已经过时了。每个标头配置有单独数量的受信任代理。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: All reserved and invalid characters remain quoted. Previously, only some reserved characters were preserved, and invalid bytes were replaced instead of left quoted.
trans-unit.target: 0.15版本的变化:所有保留字符和无效字符保留引号。以前,只有一些保留字符被保留,无效字节被替换,而不是留下引号。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: All reserved characters remain unquoted. Previously, only some reserved characters were left unquoted.
trans-unit.target: 0.15版本的变化:所有保留字符都不加引号。以前,只有一些保留字符不加引号。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: Bind to a Unix socket by passing a path that starts with unix:// as the hostname.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15中更改：通过传递以 unix:// 开头的路径作为 hostname 绑定到Unix套接字。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: Original WSGI environ values are stored in the werkzeug.proxy_fix.orig dict. orig_remote_addr, orig_wsgi_url_scheme, and orig_http_host are deprecated and will be removed in 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15中进行了更改：原始WSGI环境值存储在 werkzeug.proxy_fix.orig dict中。 orig_remote_addr ， orig_wsgi_url_scheme 和 orig_http_host 已弃用，并将在1.0中删除。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: Stats are written even if profile_dir is given, and can be disable by passing stream=None.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15中进行了更改：即使给出了 profile_dir ，也会写入统计信息，并且可以通过传递 stream=None 来禁用统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: Support X-Forwarded-Port and X-Forwarded-Prefix.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15中更改：支持 X-Forwarded-Port 和 X-Forwarded-Prefix 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: The errors parameter defaults to leaving invalid bytes quoted instead of replacing them.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.15中进行了更改： errors 参数默认为保留无效的字节而不是替换它们。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: The content type and length headers are set based on input stream detection. Previously this only set the WSGI keys.
trans-unit.target: 0.15版本的变化:根据输入流检测来设置内容类型和长度头。以前只设置WSGI键。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.15: The ranges passed in are validated.
trans-unit.target: 0.15版本的变化:传入的范围被验证。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: Accept objects are forced immutable now.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中更改：现在强制 Accept 对象不可变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: Added cache_timeout.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中更改：添加了 cache_timeout 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: Added sort_parameters and sort_key.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中更改：添加了 sort_parameters 和 sort_key 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: If a dict is provided as file in the dict for the data parameter the content type has to be called content_type now instead of mimetype. This change was made for consistency with werkzeug.FileWrapper.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中进行了更改：如果将dict作为dict中的文件提供给 data 参数，则必须立即将内容类型称为 content_type 而不是 mimetype 。进行此更改是为了与 werkzeug.FileWrapper 保持一致。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: If the key does no longer exist a list is returned instead of raising an error.
trans-unit.target: 0.5版本的变化:如果键不再存在,将返回一个列表,而不是引发一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: In older versions a IndexError was raised instead of a KeyError if the object was missing.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中进行了更改：在较早的版本中，如果缺少对象，则会引发 IndexError 而不是 KeyError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: In previous versions “;” and “&” could be used for url decoding. This changed in 0.5 where only “&” is supported. If you want to use “;” instead a different separator can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中更改：在以前的版本中；“;” 和“＆”可用于url解码。更改为0.5，其中仅支持“＆”。如果要使用“;” 相反，可以提供不同的 separator 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: Returns a TypeConversionDict instead of a regular dict. The cls parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中更改：返回 TypeConversionDict 而不是常规dict。该 cls 加入参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: This function is now a thin wrapper over EnvironBuilder which was added in 0.5. The headers, environ_base, environ_overrides and charset parameters were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中进行了更改：此功能现在是在0.5中添加的 EnvironBuilder 的精简包装。添加了 headers ， environ_base ， environ_overrides 和 charset 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: This method now accepts the same arguments as EnvironBuilder. Because of this the environ parameter is now called environ_overrides.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中更改：此方法现在接受与 EnvironBuilder 相同的参数。因此， environ 参数现在称为 environ_overrides 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: This object became immutable.
trans-unit.target: 0.5版本的变化:这个对象变得不可更改。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: This used to raise IndexError, which was inconsistent with the list API.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中进行了更改：这曾经引发 IndexError ，它与列表API不一致。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: added allowed parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中更改：添加了 allowed 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: previously this method accepted a bogus calculate_subdomain parameter that did not have any effect. It was removed because of that.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中进行了更改：以前，此方法接受了一个没有任何效果的伪 calculate_subdomain 参数。因此，将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: read-only mode was enforced by using immutables classes for all data.
trans-unit.target: 在0.5版本中有所改变:通过对所有数据使用不朽类来执行只读模式。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.5: the direct_passthrough parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.5中更改：添加了 direct_passthrough 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.6.1: set() now accepts the same arguments as add().
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.6.1中进行了更改： set() 现在接受与 add() 相同的参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.6.1: HEAD is added to methods if GET is present.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.6.1中进行了更改：如果存在 GET ，则将 HEAD 添加到 methods 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.6.1: Instead of a manager the release_local() function can be used as well.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.6.1中进行了更改：也可以使用 release_local() 函数代替管理器。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.6.1: The class can be instantiated with a callable as well now.
trans-unit.target: 在0.6.1版本中有所改变。现在该类也可以用可调用来实例化了。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.6: path and base_url can now be unicode strings that are encoded with iri_to_uri().
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.6中进行了更改： path 和 base_url 现在可以是使用 iri_to_uri() 编码的unicode字符串。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.6: Previously that function was called fix_headers and modified the response object in place. Also since 0.6, IRIs in location and content-location headers are handled properly.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.6中进行了更改：以前该函数称为 fix_headers ,并在适当位置修改了响应对象。同样从0.6开始，正确处理了位置和内容位置标头中的IRI。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.6: The Content-Length header is now set.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.6中更改：现在设置了 Content-Length 标头。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.6: The general purpose classes are now pickleable in each protocol as long as the contained objects are pickleable. This means that the FileMultiDict won’t be pickleable as soon as it contains a file.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.6中进行了更改：现在，只要所包含的对象是可腌制的，通用类就可以在每个协议中进行腌制。这意味着 FileMultiDict 不会，只要它包含一个文件是与pickle。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.7: ident_func was added.
trans-unit.target: 在0.7版中进行了更改：添加了 ident_func 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.7: Added encoding_errors and host_matching.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.7中进行了更改：添加了 encoding_errors 和 host_matching 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.7: Added query_args.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.7中更改：添加了 query_args 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.7: You can pass a different ident function to the local manager that will then be propagated to all the locals passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在0.7版本中有所改变。你可以将不同的身份函数传递给本地管理器,然后将其传播给所有传递给构造函数的本地人。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.8: query_args can be a string.
trans-unit.target: 在版本0.8中更改： query_args 可以是字符串。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.8: This function now ensures that the limit was reached.
trans-unit.target: 0.8版本的变化:这个功能现在可以确保达到极限。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.8: This will no longer raise a ValueError when an unexpected server name was passed.
trans-unit.target: 0.8版本的变化:当传递一个意外的服务器名称时,将不再引发ValueError。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.9.6: The safe_conversion parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9.6版中更改：添加了 safe_conversion 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.9: quote is now implicitly on.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9版中进行了更改：现在隐式打开了 quote 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.9: Added support for cls argument.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9版中进行了更改：添加了对 cls 参数的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.9: Previous to Werkzeug 0.9 this would only contain form data for POST and PUT requests.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9版本中有所改变。在Werkzeug 0.9之前,这只包含POST和PUT请求的表单数据。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.9: The linked() function was removed without replacement as it was an API that does not support the changes to the encoding model.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9版中进行了更改：由于 linked() 函数是一个不支持对编码模型进行更改的API，因此无需替换就可以删除该函数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.9: The path is now decoded and a charset and encoding parameter can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9版本中有所改变。现在路径已被解码,并可提供字符集和编码参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.9: This data structure now stores unicode values similar to how the multi dicts do it. The main difference is that bytes can be set as well which will automatically be latin1 decoded.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9版本中有所改变。这个数据结构现在存储的unicode值与multi dicts的存储方式类似。主要的区别是,字节也可以被设置为latin1解码。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 0.9: This stream is now always available but might be consumed by the form parser later on. Previously the stream was only set if no parsing happened.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9版本中有所改变。这个流现在总是可用的,但以后可能会被表单解析器消耗。以前只有在没有解析的情况下才会设置该流。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0.0: Accept internal values are no longer ordered alphabetically for equal quality tags. Instead the initial order is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 在1.0.0版中进行了更改：对于质量相同的标签， Accept 内部值不再按字母顺序排列。而是保留初始顺序。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0.0: A warning is shown when the passed server name does not match the incoming WSGI server name.
trans-unit.target: 1.0.0版本的变化:当传递的服务器名称与传入的WSGI服务器名称不匹配时,会显示一个警告。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0.0: Added the original_exception attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在1.0.0版中进行了更改：添加了 original_exception 属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0.0: If the passed server name specifies port 443, it will match if the incoming scheme is https without a port.
trans-unit.target: 在1.0.0版中进行了更改：如果传递的服务器名称指定端口443，则如果传入的方案是不带端口的 https ，则它将匹配。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0.0: Returns a MultiDict instead of a TypeConversionDict.
trans-unit.target: 在版本1.0.0中更改：返回 MultiDict 而不是 TypeConversionDict 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0.0: The check is run for methods other than GET and HEAD.
trans-unit.target: 在1.0.0版中更改：对 GET 和 HEAD 以外的方法运行检查。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0.0: The string 'None' is accepted for samesite.
trans-unit.target: 在1.0.0版中更改：字符串 'None' 被 samesite 接受。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0: Added merge_slashes.
trans-unit.target: 在版本1.0中更改：添加了 merge_slashes 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0: Added retry_after parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本1.0中更改：添加了 retry_after 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0: Deprecated code has been removed:
trans-unit.target: 在1.0版本中有所改变。删除了过时的代码。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0: If url_scheme is ws or wss, only WebSocket rules will match.
trans-unit.target: 在版本1.0中更改：如果 url_scheme 是 ws 或 wss ，则仅WebSocket规则将匹配。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0: Support MultiDict. Allow passing kwargs.
trans-unit.target: 在版本1.0中更改：支持 MultiDict 。允许传递 kwargs 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0: Supports pathlib.
trans-unit.target: 在版本1.0中更改：支持 pathlib 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 1.0: The default fallback_mimetype is application/octet-stream. If a filename looks like a text mimetype, the utf-8 charset is added to it.
trans-unit.target: 在版本1.0中更改：默认 fallback_mimetype 为 application/octet-stream 。如果文件名看起来像文本模仿类型，则将 utf-8 字符集添加到其中。

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: Changelog

trans-unit.source: Check if a header is an HTTP/1.1 “Hop-by-Hop” header.
trans-unit.target: 检查标头是否为HTTP / 1.1“逐段”标头。

trans-unit.source: Check if a header is an entity header.
trans-unit.target: 检查一个头是否是实体头。

trans-unit.source: Check if a key is present.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否有钥匙。

trans-unit.source: Check if an etag is part of the set ignoring weak tags. It is also possible to use the in operator.
trans-unit.target: 检查etag是否是忽略弱标签的集合的一部分。也可以使用 in 运算符。

trans-unit.source: Check if an etag is part of the set including weak and strong tags.
trans-unit.target: 检查一个etag是否是集合的一部分,包括弱标签和强标签。

trans-unit.source: Check if an etag is strong.
trans-unit.target: 检查一个etag是否强大。

trans-unit.source: Check if an etag is weak.
trans-unit.target: 检查一个etag是否很弱。

trans-unit.source: Check if the mimetype indicates JSON data, either application/json or application/*+json.
trans-unit.target: 检查mimetype是否指示JSON数据（application / json或application / * + json）。

trans-unit.source: Checks if a given byte content range is valid for the given length.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定长度的字节内容范围是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Checks if a host is trusted against a list. This also takes care of port normalization.
trans-unit.target: 根据列表检查主机是否被信任。这也是对端口规范化的处理。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the application is running from within the Werkzeug reloader subprocess.
trans-unit.target: 检查应用程序是否在Werkzeug reloader子进程中运行。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the function accepts the arguments and keyword arguments. Returns a new (args, kwargs) tuple that can safely be passed to the function without causing a TypeError because the function signature is incompatible. If drop_extra is set to True (which is the default) any extra positional or keyword arguments are dropped automatically.
trans-unit.target: 检查函数是否接受参数和关键字参数。返回一个新的 (args, kwargs) 元组，该元组可以安全地传递给函数，而不会引起 TypeError ,因为函数签名不兼容。如果将 drop_extra 设置为 True （这是默认设置），则会自动删除任何多余的位置或关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: Clear the auth info and enable basic auth.
trans-unit.target: 清除认证信息并启用基本认证。

trans-unit.source: Clear the auth info and enable digest auth.
trans-unit.target: 清除认证信息,启用摘要认证。

trans-unit.source: Clear the set.
trans-unit.target: 清理设置。

trans-unit.source: Clears all headers.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有的标题。

trans-unit.source: Close the underlying file if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话,关闭基础文件。

trans-unit.source: Close the wrapped response if possible. You can also use the object in a with statement which will automatically close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话,关闭封装的响应。你也可以在with语句中使用对象,这样会自动关闭它。

trans-unit.source: Closes all files. If you put real file objects into the files dict you can call this method to automatically close them all in one go.
trans-unit.target: 关闭所有文件。如果将真实 file 对象放入 files 字典中，则可以调用此方法以一次性自动关闭它们。

trans-unit.source: Closes associated resources of this request object. This closes all file handles explicitly. You can also use the request object in a with statement which will automatically close it.
trans-unit.target: 关闭该请求对象的相关资源。这将显式关闭所有文件句柄。你也可以在with语句中使用请求对象,这样会自动关闭它。

trans-unit.source: Colored Logging
trans-unit.target: 彩色测井

trans-unit.source: Combine multiple applications as a single WSGI application. Requests are dispatched to an application based on the path it is mounted under.
trans-unit.target: 将多个应用程序合并为一个WSGI应用程序。根据应用程序挂载的路径向其发送请求。

trans-unit.source: Combining of both methods is not allowed:
trans-unit.target: 不允许两种方法结合使用。

trans-unit.target: 通用描述符

trans-unit.target: 条件响应助手

trans-unit.target: 配置Apache

trans-unit.source: Configuring lighttpd
trans-unit.target: 配置lighttpd

trans-unit.target: Constants

trans-unit.source: Contains the incoming request data as string in case it came with a mimetype Werkzeug does not handle.
trans-unit.target: 包含传入的请求数据为字符串,以防Werkzeug不处理的mimetype。

trans-unit.source: Context Locals
trans-unit.target: 语境本地人

trans-unit.source: Convenience Helpers
trans-unit.target: 便利助手

trans-unit.source: Convenience method for conditional requests.

trans-unit.source: Convert a URI to an IRI. All valid UTF-8 characters are unquoted, leaving all reserved and invalid characters quoted. If the URL has a domain, it is decoded from Punycode.

trans-unit.source: Create a new WSGI environ dict based on the values passed. The first parameter should be the path of the request which defaults to ‘/’. The second one can either be an absolute path (in that case the host is localhost:80) or a full path to the request with scheme, netloc port and the path to the script.
trans-unit.target: 根据传递的值创建一个新的WSGI环境。第一个参数应该是请求的路径，默认为“ /”。第二个可以是绝对路径（在这种情况下，主机是localhost：80），也可以是带有方案，netloc端口和脚本路径的请求的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Create a new request object based on the values provided. If environ is given missing values are filled from there. This method is useful for small scripts when you need to simulate a request from an URL. Do not use this method for unittesting, there is a full featured client object (Client) that allows to create multipart requests, support for cookies etc.
trans-unit.target: 根据提供的值创建一个新的请求对象。如果给出环境，则从那里填充缺失值。当您需要模拟来自URL的请求时，此方法对小型脚本很有用。不要使用此方法进行单元测试，有一个功能齐全的客户端对象（ Client ），它可以创建多部分请求，对cookie的支持等。

trans-unit.source: Create a new response object from an application output. This works best if you pass it an application that returns a generator all the time. Sometimes applications may use the write() callable returned by the start_response function. This tries to resolve such edge cases automatically. But if you don’t get the expected output you should set buffered to True which enforces buffering.
trans-unit.target: 从应用程序输出中创建一个新的响应对象。如果您向它传递一个始终返回生成器的应用程序，则效果最佳。有时应用程序可能会使用 start_response 函数返回的 write() 可调用函数。这将尝试自动解决此类极端情况。但是，如果没有得到预期的输出，则应将 buffered 设置为 True ，以强制执行缓冲。

trans-unit.source: Does the complete dispatching process. view_func is called with the endpoint and a dict with the values for the view. It should look up the view function, call it, and return a response object or WSGI application. http exceptions are not caught by default so that applications can display nicer error messages by just catching them by hand. If you want to stick with the default error messages you can pass it catch_http_exceptions=True and it will catch the http exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 完成完整的调度过程。用端点调用 view_func ，用视图的值调用dict。它应该查找视图函数，调用它，然后返回一个响应对象或WSGI应用程序。默认情况下不会捕获http异常，因此应用程序只需手动捕获即可显示更好的错误消息。如果您希望 catch_http_exceptions=True 默认错误消息，则可以将其传递给catch_http_exceptions = True，它将捕获http异常。

trans-unit.source: FastCGI deployments tend to be hard to debug on most webservers. Very often the only thing the server log tells you is something along the lines of “premature end of headers”. In order to debug the application the only thing that can really give you ideas why it breaks is switching to the correct user and executing the application by hand.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数Web服务器上，往往很难调试FastCGI部署。通常，服务器日志告诉您的只是“报头过早结束”这一行。为了调试应用程序，唯一可以真正让您了解中断原因的方法是切换到正确的用户并手动执行应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Finally if you have set all the conditional values, you can make the response conditional against a request. Which means that if the request can assure that it has the information already, no data besides the headers is sent over the network which saves traffic. For that you should set at least an etag (which is used for comparison) and the date header and then call make_conditional with the request object.
trans-unit.target: 最后，如果您设置了所有条件值，则可以使响应针对请求成为条件。这意味着，如果请求可以确保它已经具有信息，那么除了标头之外就不会通过网络发送任何数据，从而节省了流量。为此，您应该至少设置一个etag（用于比较）和date标头，然后使用请求对象调用 make_conditional 。

trans-unit.source: However, many WSGI servers add a non-standard environ key with the raw path. To match this behavior, Werkzeug’s test client and development server will add the raw value to both the REQUEST_URI and RAW_URI keys. If you want to route based on this value, you can use middleware to replace PATH_INFO in the environ before it reaches the application. However, keep in mind that these keys are non-standard and not guaranteed to be present.
trans-unit.target: 但是，许多WSGI服务器在原始路径中添加了一个非标准的环境密钥。为了匹配此行为，Werkzeug的测试客户端和开发服务器将原始值添加到 REQUEST_URI 和 RAW_URI 键中。如果要基于此值进行路由，则可以在中间件到达应用程序之前使用中间件替换其中的 PATH_INFO 。但是，请记住，这些密钥是非标准的，不能保证存在。

trans-unit.source: If shallow is True the environment is initialized as shallow object around the environ. Every operation that would modify the environ in any way (such as consuming form data) raises an exception unless the shallow attribute is explicitly set to False. This is useful for middlewares where you don’t want to consume the form data by accident. A shallow request is not populated to the WSGI environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果 shallow 为 True ,则将环境初始化为周围环境的浅对象。除非将 shallow 属性显式设置为 False ,否则将以任何方式修改环境的每个操作（例如使用表单数据）都会引发异常。这对于您不想意外使用表单数据的中间件很有用。浅层请求不会填充到WSGI环境中。

trans-unit.source: If the path info could not be determined, None is returned.

trans-unit.source: If the range is for bytes, the length is not None and there is exactly one range and it is satisfiable it returns a (start, stop) tuple, otherwise None.

trans-unit.source: If the request method is HEAD or the status code is in a range where the HTTP specification requires an empty response, an empty iterable is returned.

trans-unit.source: If the response is streamed (the response is not an iterable with a length information) this property is True. In this case streamed means that there is no information about the number of iterations. This is usually True if a generator is passed to the response object.

trans-unit.source: In Python 2 there are two basic string types: str and unicode. str may carry encoded unicode data but it’s always represented in bytes whereas the unicode type does not contain bytes but charpoints. What does this mean? Imagine you have the German Umlaut ö. In ASCII you cannot represent that character, but in the latin-1 and utf-8 character sets you can represent it, but they look differently when encoded:

trans-unit.source: Internal exception that is raised if Werkzeug detects a disconnected client. Since the client is already gone at that point attempting to send the error message to the client might not work and might ultimately result in another exception in the server. Mainly this is here so that it is silenced by default as far as Werkzeug is concerned.
